name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<i8, N> as core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt>::leading_zeros

core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt::cast.doc:
Performs elementwise conversion of this vector's elements to another SIMD-valid type.

 This follows the semantics of Rust's `as` conversion for casting integers (wrapping to
 other integer types, and saturating to float types).

core_simd::simd::num::uint::SimdUint::le.doc: Returns the number of leading zeros in the binary representation of each element.
